/>
VI.i.2.B.1.b
.
Definition:  Duplicate Payment
A
duplicate payment
is defined as a type of erroneous payment where VA concurrently made two or more payments to a beneficiary, one or more of which are not authorized by law.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
